授業方法:
For the Fall semester 2021, this course will be held face to face, but may include some ONLINE content in both simultaneous two-way or on-demand format.

< For students permitted to take classes online > - On-demand video will be recorded and made available via Google Classroom. Students need to check LUNA for more details on accessing Google Classroom

Lessons will be designed to foster student autonomy and enhance students' ability to critically assess written materials and oral presentations/lectures in and English-only environment.

Students are expected to actively engage in class discussions based on teacher lectures or previously assigned writing assignments or homework.

Additionally, students can expect to regularly discuss and review course content in pairs or small groups as well as providing individual oral presentations utilized in class

トピック.授業外学習2:
Students must have regular access to computers and the internet either at home or through an on-campus computer lab to access Google Classroom

The amount of study time for homework will vary from week to week and will depend on 1) the content being reviewed, and 2) the ability of individual students to understand the content. However, students can expect to do a minimum of 1 hour and a maximum of 2 hours of study each week in preparation for or prior to completing an assignment for homework
